title: Comonnn pls help me  why all ignor me :(
body:
I asking already three time and nothing i have perma ban 1 year and nobody wants to help me   admins ignoring me.......
PLS UNBAN MEEE :(

replies.body: I checked up on this account, and it doesn't look like it's been banned at all. It looks like there might have been some suspicious logins some time ago, however, so reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can. Make sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account" and they'll be able to help you out!
